class.name: PolyShape2D
class.brief_description: The base class for implementing decomposition or mesh-based classes.
class.description: Takes outlines from [PolyNode2D] added as children of this node and decomposes them into shapes determined by [member build_mode]. This class is used as a base for classes such as [PolyCollisionShape2D] and other related mesh-based objects in 2D.

members.member: The mode to build shapes from [PolyNode2D] children.

constants.constant: Filters outlines into outer outlines (mostly used to implement concave shapes).
